DOC.brief_summary: Exploration antipsoriatic effect UVB-therapy +/- CYP-inhibitor Ketokonazol affect psoriatic skin
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Antipsoriatic Effects UVB-induced Synthesis 1alpha , 25-Dihydroxyvitamin D3 ( 1alpha , 25 ( OH ) 2D3 , Calcitriol ) Keratinocytes Psoriatic Skin , Using Cytochrom-P ( CYP ) Inhibitor Ketokonazol
DOC.criteria: age : 18 80 diagnosis psoriasis vulgaris ( mild middle ) current antipsoriatic therapy ( systemic/topical ) least 5 psoriatic area 5x5 cm pregnancy/nursing mother woman reproductive age without adequate contraception severe acute form psoriasis vulgaris patient receive systemic topical antipsoroatic treatment past 3 month UVtherapy past 3 month patient positive anamnesis squamous cell carcinoma , malignant melanoma , basalioma epilepsy
